title: Tasteful Twist
description: Tasteful Twist is a web app offering diverse global recipes via multiple server-side API integrations. Users can navigate to cuisines like Italian, Greek, and Spanish, view detailed recipes, and save favorites locally. I developed the secure signup/sign-in pages and implemented email communication using EmailJS, enhancing user interaction.

title: ReadMe Generator
description: The README.md file generator is a user-friendly tool designed to effortlessly create professional documents for GitHub. The project includes clear instructions for setup, usage, contributions, and other necessary and optional sections to ensure a polished and professional README file. It is designed to be accessible, making it easy for anyone to understand and utilize the project's functionalities.

title: Book App
description: This project is a **React-based web application** designed to allow users to browse, view details of, and manage a personalized list of favorite books. The application fetches book data from an external API and allows users to add or remove books from their favorites list. It leverages several modern React features and libraries such as **React Router DOM v6**, **Context API**, and **Axios**.
